conbody.p:
Before you install Plant Applications, verify that the following software versions are installed on the target machine.
Docker Community Edition version 18.0 or later
Rabbit MQ version 3.6.8
Cloud Foundry UAA version 4.4.0 and configure the UAAC Settings
SSL Certificates
Apache CouchDB version 2.3.1
Docker Compose
Docker Swarm
Dependency Docker Images for Messaging and HAProxyEnable Docker Swarm on your environment before installing the Plant Applications Universal Client Docker.
